name: Blind Jump (TsFreddie)
description:
Control your character blindly to navigate through levels. You have 10 seconds to plan your actions.

Tips that didn't made into tutorials:

  • You can move during replay mode to continue recording without erasing all your movements.
  • F is NOT a dash button

Controls:

  • A,D - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • Enter - Skip to replay / restart the replay
  • F - Fast forward during replay
  • R - Reset

Secret & Spoiler:

  • Pressing 1-4 during the headphone icon intro will force the game to load the respected levels. It is only recommended if you want to revisit certain levels or want to hear the music in the later levels.

Credits:

  • TsFreddie - Programmer / Shader / Item sprites / Sound design / Music
  • Px-Parallel - Character sprites / Tile sprites / Level design
  • FengMo - Programmer / Emotional support
